title: The Steam Deck transformed how I play games
description:
The Steam Deck completely transformed how I play games and how I connect with them at an emotional level, and I'm not alone in this...

Watch the full talk on Linux 4 Everyone: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lzjmPmfLB-o

GamingOnLinux: https://www.gamingonlinux.com/

Gardiner's Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/GardinerBryant
